alert.note: Alert for Bradford; Eastern Alachua; Eastern Clay; Union; Western Clay (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 19 at 12:37PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Bradford, northeastern Alachua, east central Union and Clay Counties through 115 PM EDT... At 1236 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Raiford to Sampson. Storms forming along an outflow boundary could strengthen. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Starke, Keystone Heights, Middleburg, Bellair-Meadowbrook Terrace, Camp Blanding, Doctors Inlet, Lakeside, Kingsley, Sampson and Penney Farms. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 200 PM EDT for northern and northeastern Florida.

area.areaDesc: Bradford; Eastern Alachua; Eastern Clay; Union; Western Clay
